oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An economic evaluation of the Organic Farming Scheme
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Latacz-Lohmann, Uwe
Renwick, Alan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
"Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This report was presented at the UK Organic Research 2002 Conference. This paper describes a review commissioned by DEFRA into the operation of the Organic Farming Scheme. In particular the review examines the rationale of the Scheme, and its effectiveness and efficiency in meeting its objectives, and makes recommendations for improvements to the Scheme.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Organic Centre Wales, Institute of Rural Studies, University of Wales Aberystwyth
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Latacz-Lohmann, Uwe and Renwick, Alan (2002) An economic evaluation of the Organic Farming Scheme. In: Powell, Jane and et al., (Eds.) Proceedings of the UK Organic Research 2002 Conference, Organic Centre Wales, Institute of Rural Studies, University of Wales Aberystwyth, pp. 311-312.
